trip_inclusions: 13 nights on a luxury yacht, the MV Lady Eleganza
A total of 38 meals with complimentary onboard beverages served at your discretion
In Korčula, witness a traditional sword dance known as Moreška
Visit the traditional village of Radošić to sample local delights and see a cultural performance
Explore the dramatic waterfalls of Krka National Park
Come aboard the MV Lady Eleganza
